summary: This document outlines a purchase and sales agreement between Richard Yospin, Trustee of The Richard Yospin Family Trust, and Granite Reality LLC for a property in Bradford, NH. It details the terms of sale, including the selling price, deposits, and contingencies related to inspections and financing.

persons.name: Richard Yospin
persons.context: Richard Yospin is the Trustee of The Richard Yospin Family Trust and is acting as the seller in this real estate transaction.

persons.name: Margaret Weathers
persons.context: Margaret Weathers is identified as a seller agent from Four Seasons Sotheby's International Realty involved in the transaction.

connections.description: Richard Yospin is selling the property to Granite Reality LLC as per the purchase and sales agreement.

events.title: Purchase and Sales Agreement Signed
events.description: The purchase and sales agreement was signed between Richard Yospin and Granite Reality LLC for the sale of a property.

keyFacts: The selling price of the property is $1,075,000.
A deposit of $10,000 is to be held in escrow, with an additional $90,000 due upon satisfactory inspection results.
The agreement includes contingencies for inspections and financing.
The buyer reserves the right to conduct a walk-through inspection prior to closing.
The agreement specifies that the property will be delivered free of all encumbrances except for usual public utilities.
